title: Amusing TV Spot for Seth Rogen's 'The Studio' Riffing on Hollywood
description: "It's a very deep and complex film, but I want that diarrhea explosion in the trailer." Gross! Apple TV has debuted a funny new TV spot for their upcoming series arriving in March called The Studio. This wacky series is one big riff on Hollywood, making fun of movie studios and the egotistical executives who work at these places. The series follows a legacy Hollywood movie studio striving to survive in a world increasingly difficult for art & business to thrive together. "The job is a meat grinder." Ain't that the truth. Seth Rogen stars as Matt Remick, who takes over Continental Studios.
